Pages.title: Planning
Pages.content: This Insight tells about your WorkForce, monthly comparisons of your WorkForce. In addition to that it will show you workforce growth in different departments and It tell about where should you recruite people in future.

Pages.title: Benchmarks
Pages.content: What are the targets, how much you achieved !

Pages.title: Compliance
Pages.content: Net Income is referred to as the bottom line, net profit, or net earnings is a measure of the profitability of a venture after accounting for all costs.

Pages.title: Expenses YOY
Pages.content: Expenses Year Over Year (YOY) measures the total cost or outflow of money each month and compares these expenses to the months of the prior year.
